thread.title: Great, modern hotel near Paddington station!
thread.title_full: Great, modern hotel near Paddington station! - Review of Mercure London Paddington Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: mikkomax
title: Great, modern hotel near Paddington station!
text:
Stayed here for one night in March 2017.
This hotel features modern rooms at the heart of London, a short 15 minute walk to Oxford Street. Plenty of pubs and restaurants are close by the hotel. My room had a around 50 inch TV which was a great addition after a day out. Check-in staff were extremely friendly and the breakfast decent.
Definitely a good hotel in Mercure standards. The only disappointment was the lack of online check-in and fast check-out which I am used to at Accor properties, hopefully in the future there will be more consistency within the Mercure and other Accor hotels.
